sqlMap.select: SELECT AREA_CODE AS code , AREA_NAME AS name , JN_SSNO AS registerNumber , JN_SAJANG AS ownerName , JN_ADDR1 AS address1 , JN_ADDR2 AS address2 , JN_ZIPCODE AS postalCode , JN_UPTAE AS businessCondition , JN_JONGMOK AS businessType , JN_TEL1 AS phoneNumber1 , JN_TEL2 AS phoneNumber2 , JN_FAX AS faxNumber , JN_ANNAME1 AS adminName , JN_ANTEL1 AS adminPhoneNumber , JN_ANNAME2 AS responsibilityName , JN_ANTEL2 AS responsibilityPhoneNumber , JN_CHEKUM AS calculationMethodType , 'N' AS useJoabillTaxInvoiceYesNo FROM $catalogName$.dbo.JNOTRY WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY AREA_CODE
